summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to capital facilities; authorizing and providing for the issuance and sale of limited tax general obligation bonds, in one or more series, for the purposes of paying all or part of the costs of constructing a parking garage for the new central library, the costs of issuance and sale of the bonds, and for other City purposes approved by ordinance; providing for terms, covenants and manner of sale of the bonds; and providing for agreements and activities in connection with the disposition of the proceeds of the bonds; and authorizing the creation of a new fund.
